product_name: REI Brookdale Mini Messenger Bag - Women's
long_description: The REI Brookdale mini messenger bag blends a bit of outdoor performance with urban style and utility, resulting in a competent everyday commuter or travel bag with plenty of organization. Main compartment is covered and secured with a magnetic-closure flap; internal organization includes a zip-secure pocket and credit card slots. Fleece-lined and zip-close pockets underneath flap protect your phone and other small accessories. Exterior back zipper pocket gives quick access to small items; key clip keeps keys secure and easy to locate. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides secure and comfortable single shoulder carry. REI Brookdale mini messenger bag is made of partially recycled, post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: The REI Brookdale mini messenger bag blends a bit of outdoor performance with urban style and utility, resulting in a competent everyday commuter or travel bag with plenty of organization.
